result.ga: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.orig: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.html: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachtaI enjoyed your company.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain mé sult as ḃur gcuideaċtaI enjoyed your company.

result.html: I gcuideachta cairdeIn the company of friends.
result.ponchtml: I gcuideaċta cairdeIn the company of friends.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: Níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.html: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ Séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
